title: Azure Based Nextcloud Deployment
description: I deployed and secured Nextcloud on an Ubuntu server in Azure to gain hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure, virtual networks, and secure server configuration, while providing a private cloud storage solution

title: Splunk Monitoring and Analysis
description: For practice, I deployed Splunk Enterprise and utilized the BOTSv3 dataset to simulate a real-world security environment, writing and executing custom queries to detect potential threats. I then visualized these findings in a clear and digestible manner through custom dashboards, gaining valuable practical insights and hands-on experience into security log analysis and threat detection.

title: Portfolio Website
description: I built a responsive web page using React and Vite to showcase my resume, skills, and experience

title: Neuraset Medical Simulator
description: I developed embedded software for a consumer EEG neurofeedback device based on patent, analyzing brain activity and providing personalized treatments using the LENS protocol
